Show the Benchmark UI (in game: Esc -> Benchmark).
Certain code are injected to the game and will cause the game to run slower.
Optimizer is also not available when benchmarking is enabled.
Please restart the game after changing this setting.

The optimizer is not available because benchmarking is enabled.
Please disable benchmarking and restart the game to use the optimizer.
